    • Constructor Detail

      • Rules

        public Rules(double smallBlind,
             double bigBlind,
             double ante,
             int timeLimitSecs,
             int maxCapacity,
             double[] prizes,
             int blindLevelTimeMinutes,
             double[] bigBlinds,
             double[] smallBlinds,
             double[] antes,
             Rules.GameType gameType)
        Tournament constructor.
        Parameters:
        smallBlind - the amount the small blind begins at
        bigBlind - the amount the big blind begins at
        ante - the amount the ante begins at
        timeLimitSecs - the amount each player has to act;
        maxCapacity - the maximum number of players allowed to sit at the table
        prizes - the prizes awarded to the highest finishers
        blindLevelTimeMinutes - the amount of time each blind level lasts
        bigBlinds - the amount of money the big blind is at each level
        smallBlinds - the amount of money the small blind is at each level
        antes - the amount of money the ante is at each level
        gameType - the type of game the players will be playing at the table

      • Rules

        public Rules(double smallBlind,
             double bigBlind,
             double ante,
             int timeLimitSecs,
             int maxCapacity,
             Rules.GameType gameType)
        Cash game constructor.
        Parameters:
        smallBlind - the amount of money the small blind will be
        bigBlind - the amount of money the big blind will be
        ante - the amount of money the ante will be
        timeLimitSecs - the number of seconds each player has to act on their turn
        maxCapacity - the maximum number of people allowed to sit at the table
        gameType - the type of game the players will be playing at the table
